name: Creativ.es
overview:
Creatives is a branded job site that exclusively serves the needs of companies and agencies seeking creative talent to promote themselves. Allowing for greater exposure of the company, culture and experience.

The footprint of the site has been minimized to allow companies to own the experience with full take-over images. This also allows companies to utilize their brand and use messaging to target precise talent and engage a burgeoning community of creative and technology innovators.

Creatives unique platform allows companies seeking creative talent to easily create and post jobs which are seamlessly pushed out to Twitter and Facebook and instantly accessible on iOS devices.

First public appearance unveiled at TechCrunch’s Disrupt Conference in San Francisco Sept. 12th, 2011.
